channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security SiteProtector System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security SiteProtector System

item.title: CVE-2020-4140|2024-09-17T01:41:58.704Z -- ibm -- security%20siteprotector%20system
item.description: IBM Security SiteProtector System 3.1.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 174052.
